job description:
SAP O2C Data Analyst
Ref No.: 18-38550

Location: Indianapolis, Indiana
Experience and Key skills needed:

Minimum of 5 years' experience in SAP O2C
Functional/technical proficiency with full lifecycle SAP implementations
Experience in SAP O2C( Order to Cash) individual functions like
Contracts
Sales Order Processing
Pricing
Logistics Execution
Billing
Account Determination
Output
Understanding of various data elements in SAP O2C and its interdependencies.
Experience in Configuration of SAP Sales and Distribution based on business requirements
2+ full cycle implementations including: Scoping and Planning, Process Design, Configuration, Testing, Deployment, and Post Go-Live Support
